data.name: Easy Poetry
data.detailed_description:
Easy Poetry helps you write your own Chinese poem——and everything else with poetic forms.

Key features:
·Automatically marks poetic forms
·Automatically checks for Ping Ze and rhymes
·Includes nearly 100 poetic forms, including Tang Poem, Song Ci, and other traditional or modern poems
·Beginner-speaker friendly rhymes and poetic forms
·Beginner friendly tutorials
·Supports exporting and adjusting poetic forms
·Supports creating your own custom poetic forms
·Uses Ping Ze and rhymes to filter for available characters
·Supports copy & share with one click
·Full English user interface
